1.caption_en:
The diagram illustrates the Platform Architecture Framework, which combines the Platform Value Stack with the AWS Well‑Architected Framework to guide selection and design of IT infrastructure. The left panel lists value layers (Ecosystem, Engagement, Intelligence, Infrastructure) and the right panel shows the five AWS pillars (Operational Excellence, Security, Reliability, Performance, Cost Optimization).

{
  "artifactType": "informational diagram",
  "titleText": "The Platform Architecture Framework provides guidance to select and build the right IT infrastructure",
  "subtitleText": "Combines the Layers of the Platform Value Stack with the Well‑Architected Framework to give guidance",
  "layout": "three-column with central circle",
  "center": {
    "label": "PLATFORM ARCHITECTURE FRAMEWORK",
    "shape": "circle"
  },
  "leftSection": {
    "header": "PLATFORM VALUE STACK",
    "subheader": "Value Layers",
    "valueLayers": [
      "Ecosystem",
      "Engagement",
      "Intelligence",
      "Infrastructure"
    ],
    "note": "Provides guidance for platforms to enhance capabilities and deliver value to users and the surrounding ecosystem"
  },
  "rightSection": {
    "header": "AWS WELL-ARCHITECTED FRAMEWORK",
    "subheader": "The Five Pillars",
    "pillars": [
      "Operational Excellence",
      "Security",
      "Reliability",
      "Performance",
      "Cost Optimization"
    ],
    "note": "Describes key principles for designing and running cloud workloads and guidance for improvements"
  },
  "logos": [
    "Platform Innovation Kit (left, near PLATFORM VALUE STACK)",
    "AWS (right, near AWS WELL-ARCHITECTURED FRAMEWORK)"
  ],
  "colorScheme": [
    "dark blue (headers, central circle)",
    "teal (subheaders and accent)",
    "light gray (background)"
  ]
}

3.caption_en:
A dark blue-gray circular badge centered on a light background contains three centered lines of white uppercase text reading "PLATFORM / ARCHITECTURE / FRAMEWORK", with four thin diagonal lines extending from the circle toward each corner.

{
  "type": "graphic_badge",
  "shape": "circle",
  "fill_color": "dark blue-gray",
  "background_color": "very light gray",
  "text": {
    "lines": [
      "PLATFORM",
      "ARCHITECTURE",
      "FRAMEWORK"
    ],
    "color": "white",
    "case": "uppercase",
    "alignment": "center",
    "layout": "three stacked lines"
  },
  "connectors": {
    "count": 4,
    "style": "thin diagonal lines",
    "directions": [
      "top-left",
      "top-right",
      "bottom-left",
      "bottom-right"
    ],
    "color": "dark blue-gray"
  },
  "layout": {
    "position": "centered",
    "dominant_element": "circle"
  },
  "notes": "Simple diagrammatic element likely representing a platform architecture framework; text is neatly centered and evenly spaced within the circle."
}
